title: The mirror in a dream about the real imam

preview.html: Many people search for the interpretation of a mirror in a dream about Imam Al-Sadiq and do not know whether this dream brings good or bad, especially since the mirror is the tool through which we can recognize our external appearance and whether we look fit or not, and sometimes it makes us look beautiful and sometimes it highlights our flaws. The minute and there is no need for confusion because an encyclopedia will explain to you through today’s article the interpretation of seeing a mirror in a dream according to what Imam Al-Sadiq said, and in the different situations in which the fortuneteller may find himself, follow us. The mirror in a dream about the true ImamFirst: Interpretation of a mirror in a dream for a single girl. A world sees The respected interpretation, Imam Al-Sadiq, is that seeing an unmarried girl in the mirror in a dream is a vision that carries many interpretations. Sometimes it is a sign of the nearness of her marriage, if she appears dignified and attractive in appearance. It may also be a reflection of the beauty of her morals and principles that she possesses, which make her A source of admiration for many people. In other cases, the mirror reflects society’s view of it. If it is beautiful and has a dignified appearance, this is a sign of acceptance from those who see it and that it enjoys the love of those around it. But if an unmarried woman sees in her dream that her appearance in the mirror is ugly, this is a sign that she will face some Problems and crises are in her life and she must prepare for that. It could also be a sign that she is engaging in some behavior, and building ideas that make people look at her with disdain and thus distance themselves from her. Other times the mirror is a reflection of how a lonely woman feels about herself. If it carries love and affection To others, you will find that she looks beautiful and smiling in the mirror. But if she carries feelings of hatred and jealousy, she finds her appearance completely inappropriate. Second: Interpretation of a dream about a woman in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in the mirror in a dream looking beautiful and attractive, is an indication that she enjoys... With happiness and enjoyment in her married life. But if she finds that she looks ugly or wears ugly clothes, this is a sign of the problems that will arise between her and her husband, and she must be patient. But if the married woman sees that the mirror has some fractures or cracks, this is evidence of the need to be careful of the presence of some Haters or pursuers who work to spoil her relationship with her husband. Breaking a mirror in a dream may indicate hypocrites, who show the woman the opposite of what they hide, but she will soon discover their truth. Third: Interpretation of a woman’s dream in a dream about being pregnant: A pregnant woman who looks at herself in the mirror looks beautiful, in An indication that she will soon be freed from the pain and problems of pregnancy and will give birth easily, and God will make her see her fetus happy. But if she looks ugly, this is an indication that she will face some difficulties in childbirth, but she will overcome them, God willing. But if she finds in the mirror a man who closely resembles her husband, this is a sign of childbirth. Male and vice versa. Fourth: Interpretation of a woman’s dream in a dream about a man. A mirror in an unmarried man’s dream is a sign of the imminent date of his marriage, God willing, to a beautiful girl.

title: Interpretation of seeing searching for people in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of searching for people in a dream. In fact, people add to our lives, which carries many interpretations, which is the interpretation of the vision of searching for people in a dream. Thus, searching for people carries several curves in human life, represented by searching for people or replacing New friends or searching for missing people in life, and therefore the interpretation differs between the two points according to dream interpretation scholars, and it is worth noting that we are dealing with the interpretation of the dream of searching for people in dreams. Interpretation of the vision of searching for people in a dream In reality, searching for people has many interpretations, and therefore some believe that it is a bad dream and it is Losing some people or something with this meaning. Therefore, the interpretation of searching for people is as follows: It should be noted that seeing the dreamer searching for people is a sign of discomfort as well as concern for his life. Also, searching for people in a dream indicates the loss of something of value to the dreamer. But if You are looking for a familiar face in a dream, this indicates the personality of the person who has the vision, as he is considered one of the open and sociable people in life. In addition, if a single girl is looking for someone in a dream, this indicates her need to talk to someone. I also see: Interpretation of seeing the army in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of seeing a person in a dream and finding him. Therefore, the interpretation of searching for people, and it is an important interpretation of what many are searching for and what haunts them in their dreams. In addition to analyzing the reason why I saw the person himself in a dream searching for people: In addition to that, the vision of searching for people and then finding On them is one of the omen of dreams. It is also one of the dreams that indicates the release of distress and the beginning of the coming of joys and pleasures into the dreamer’s life. In addition, in the dream of a man or a married man, it indicates reconciliation between spouses, and in general, reconciliation between those who disagree. But in the case of Searching for people and finding them, this is a sign of goodness coming in the life of the person who has the vision. I also see: Interpretation of dreams about seeing the death of a husband or the death of a wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about searching for a former lover. On the other hand, searching for people in a dream indicates a loss or feeling of desire to communicate with people. Therefore, searching for The ex-lover, and it is one of the dreams that people search for, and this has resulted in the following: Accordingly, the search for the ex-lover in the dream and his absence is an indication of the problems that the dreamer faces. But if the ex-lover is searched for and found, this indicates steadfastness and love. Which the lover carries for his beloved. In addition to the ability to contact and return to each other again. Therefore, searching for a married woman’s ex-lover indicates that she will be in great trouble if she finds this lover. On the other hand, her searching for her pregnant ex-lover suggests her anxiety And her fear of giving birth. I also see: Interpretation of dreams about seeing bread in a dream for single and married women. Interpretation of a dream asking about one’s condition. It is worth mentioning and increasing the interpretations of the research and arranging

title: Interpretation of a dream about playing with dolls in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing playing with dolls in a dream by Ibn Sirin, and seeing toys with dolls indicates a weak character because it indicates missed opportunities, and playing with broken toys in a dream indicates the loss of something important to the viewer. Life, where the vision indicates the death of a loved one or material loss. There are many interpretations of seeing a bride and a doll and playing with them in a dream, and many dream researchers believe that the dream is good news for the bride and their family members coming to enjoy joy and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about playing with dolls by Ibn Sirin When you see the interpretation of seeing yourself playing with dolls in a dream from unwanted visions, this Visions indicate that people are full of interest in the world and are pursuing desires and temptations. Dreaming of playing with a doll in a dream proves that the messenger is weak and gives others a chance to interfere in his life without rights. It was an inauspicious sign to see me playing with the bride of my dreams, or I would lose people close to me, or I would lose His favorite items or I will cause great material losses. Dreaming about seeing the bride receiving the dream indicates that the Messenger felt lonely, strange and helpless because of her alienation. Seeing playing with the bride in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a small, weak person who cannot bear responsibility. Interpretation of seeing playing with Brides for Single Women: The interpretation of an unmarried woman’s dream of playing with the bride proves that she has a spirit of fun, childhood, and innocence. Seeing unmarried women playing with the bride in their dreams shows that they need everyone around them to overcome their bad mental state. Dreaming of a conversation with a bride in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates... Success in work and study, achieving aspirations and aspirations. Seeing a single woman dreaming of playing with her beloved bride proves that she wants to marry someone she loves and longs for. Seeing a young bride dreaming of having fun in her dream means that the date of her engagement and wedding is approaching the person who suits her and she will be satisfied with him. Interpretation The dream of seeing a married woman playing with dollsIn general, given the interpretation that the bride and the doll play the role of the married woman in the dream, she cannot take responsibility for herself. The dream of a gift from the husband to the bride and the dreams of the married woman prove that she lives happily and psychologically and lives in harmony with her husband and family. For married women who have not yet given birth, seeing a bride buying in a dream means that she will give birth soon and her life will change. There are indications that breastfeeding a married woman’s bride achieves what she wants and desires for her family. Dreaming of seeing the bride sleeping in a married woman’s dreams indicates the renunciation of marital disputes, And removing stress and sadness, and hearing the good news. Interpretation of a dream about playing with dolls for a pregnant woman: Seeing a bride’s toy in a pregnant woman’s dream may prove that she will give birth to a child, and it will be a source of happiness after birth. Dreaming about playing with a doll in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that she will give birth to a boy, but only if the doll does not have A feminine name. Interpretation of a dream when you see playing with dolls. Seeing yourself playing with an animated bride in a dream indicates that...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a husband marrying Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of a husband marrying a second wife by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen. We have now seen the phenomenon of searching for an interpretation of common dreams in our societies because there are those who fulfill them and vice versa. Those that are the result of a person's unconscious thinking. It's the first thing we look for in every woman after waking up. After seeing such a dream, the interpretation of the dream is that the husband is actually marrying his wife, or another has different interpretations. So what if a man dreams that he is marrying another woman? We will explain the interpretation in the following lines. Follow us. Interpretation of the dream of the husband marrying in a second. We will explain to you through the following points the interpretation of the dream of the husband marrying the second: A new woman in a dream is a new world that accepts a man, and the sweeter the woman is, the more good the man will be, but he must be careful not to distance him from the afterlife and worship. A wife in a dream could be a new partner for him in his work. If you do a good job in a dream, then this partner will be good. If the woman he marries is a famous woman, this means that the wife will control her husband and he will obey her and listen to her opinion and advice in all matters. Marrying a Jew in a dream is finding a job where he will face sin and transgression. If If a man marries his niece, daughter, or forbidden wife, then this man will be respected in his family and his children will respect and obey him. The dream may simply mean that there is fear on the part of this man, especially if he has a history of female relationships. Interpretation of a dream about a husband’s marriage, second to Ibn Sirin, through the points Next, we will explain to you the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about marrying a second wife: A man’s marriage to someone else is good for both of them, and the maintenance comes to the wife in an inheritance, or a job, or money that comes to the husband, or a new house that they move to. If the husband has older children, then the dream is a sign of Their marriage is approaching. A man’s marriage to a Christian woman in a dream indicates his distance from obedience to God and his lack of commitment to performing duties, and his wife must advise him to repent. If a woman asks for a divorce from her husband in a dream as a result of his marriage to another woman, this is evidence of their harmony in reality and the stability of their life together and that Their offspring will be mere offspring and will be blessed. Baraha. Marriage to a beautiful woman occupies a high position among God’s creatures. A man’s marriage to a woman with an ugly personality is a bad attitude towards the viewer and God’s distance from him or a material loss that will happen to him in the near future. An ugly woman in a dream has problems and problems that arise for the man. If the woman he married dies, he is poor after the blessing, and falls into hardship after the rest. Interpretation of the dream of the husband getting married in a second according to Al-Nabulsi We will explain to you through the following points Interpretation of the dream of the husband getting married again according to Al-Nabulsi: If a woman sees that she is crying over her husband’s marriage to her, then the dream is good news, and crying in a dream Generally comfort from God and imminent openness, and the dream means that her life with him will be hers. the husband. Successful change for the better. If the wedding takes place in a large party filled with loud flowers, then this man will get into trouble and suffer a great loss. The husband’s marriage to his sister to his wife

title: Learn about the interpretation of eating bananas in a dream from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dead person’s dream of eating bananas.

preview.html: Eating bananas in a dream, is it good or bad to see bananas? What are the negative meanings of dreaming about eating bananas? What does it mean to eat green bananas in a dream? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of the vision of eating bananas for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men, according to Ibn Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation. Eating bananas in a dream. Scientists interpreted that eating bananas in a married man’s dream means that he will give birth to a boy soon and he will have a certain benefit in his life, and if the dreamer eats Fresh bananas in his dream indicate abundant livelihood. He will earn a lot of money soon, and if the dreamer grows bananas, this will lead to a good condition in which his children will excel in their studies. As for the vision of eating yellow bananas, this may indicate the approaching death of the dreamer, and God (may God have mercy on him) is higher and more knowledgeable, and if the dreamer eats a large amount of bananas, this It shows his excellence. With good morals and good character, and his experiences, he was satisfied with the ruling of the Lord, and he did not object. Eating bananas in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of eating bananas as evidence that the dreamer will earn a lot of money soon and will be happy and reassured, and eating bananas in a dream can symbolize repentance from sins and regularity. In performing prayers and duties.If the dreamer is unemployed and sees himself eating green bananas, this is a sign of a great job opportunity coming his way soon. Do not regret when regret does not help. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, the Dream Interpretation website on the Internet, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Bananas in a single woman’s dream. The interpretation of eating bananas in a dream for a single woman means that she will be happy in the future and achieve all her dreams, If the dreamer eats a lot of yellow bananas, this means that she will rise to her job and reach a senior administrative position soon. If the dreamer is suffering from some health problems or is going through a crisis, then eating bananas in her dream is good news to alleviate her anxiety, improve her condition, and alleviate her difficult problems. Commentators said that seeing a single woman eating rotten bananas. A sign of her rash actions and hasty decisions that she did not think about before she made them. If the dreamer is currently in a romantic relationship with a person and she sees him eating bananas in her dream, she has good news that he will propose marriage to her soon and she will enjoy contentment and peace with him. Of mind all her life. You will win. Interpretation of a dream about eating yellow bananas for a single woman. Scientists interpreted a dream about eating yellow bananas for an unmarried woman as an indication of a handsome man who wants to marry her, and the vision carries a message telling her to take time to think before making a decision in this regard and whether the fiancée saw that. Many bananas in her dream, and this symbolizes her imminent marriage arrangement, or the dreamer eating bananas out of season, because this is a sign of imminent weakness and freedom from sorrows and worries. Eating bananas in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about eating bananas for a married woman indicates the proximity of pregnancy and the birth of fair and righteous children. With her, his job is to satisfy her needs.If she eats p

title: Interpretation of a dream about a black cat attacking me by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black cat attacking me by Ibn Sirin, there are people who have a phobia of cats and phobia is a feeling of excessive fear and terror of something together and psychologically linked to the person, as it is a phobia that is not limited to cats, and in order to put it I will give examples that there are people who have a phobia of heights and the sea Even there they have a phobia of the dark, and the subject can move from a normal state of fear to a pathological state, so you will need to pay attention to this matter and in this article we will provide you with the interpretation of a dream about a black cat attacking me by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a black cat attacking me Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin testifies to goodness and justice. A black woman attacks me according to Ibn Sirin, and we remember the correct meanings of the dream, which are: Ibn Sirin agreed that seeing a black cat does not convey others to the dreamer, and it may indicate the opposite in some special cases. Ibn Sirin interpreted that the dreamer will do bad things to him and he will suffer a great loss soon. He is exposed to misfortunes and trials, and the dreamer must be patient and ask for God’s help, because He does not disappoint those who turn to Him. It may indicate that the dreamer is affected by magic or envy, and he must protect himself by reading the Qur’an and dhikr, and insisting on it on a daily basis, even making it a daily habit. If Being able to distract the cat from him, this indicates that he will be able to rise from the despair that surrounds him from all sides, break the boredom that he suffers from, and make up for what happened to him. The dream indicates that there is a person who was deceived by the dreamer, and this person trusts him, and even keeps his secrets with him. It is often related to her married life, and we will put the interpretation of a dream about a cat that attacked me for a married woman. The dream indicates that the married woman is suffering from problems in marriage and there is a distance between her and her husband. That the married woman has committed sins and disobedience, and these sins are disturbing her life and making her constantly anxious and afraid. Than what she did will be revealed. The dream indicates that she will get into trouble and cause her fatigue and sadness, and she will wish that everything that happened to her was just a bad dream. If the cat was black, the dream shows that she trusts someone and transfers all the secrets and daily events to him, but this person or The friend reveals all the secrets and causes serious harm to her, which may lead to her divorce. title: What is the interpretation of being killed in a dream by Ibn Sirin’s bullets?

preview.html: Being killed by a bullet in a dream is one of the dreams about which there are many interpretations and disagreements. It is an annoying dream for the pioneer, making him feel a state of terror and fear, and the dreamer believes that he will lose the one he sees killing him. The dream, but the great scholars, including Ibn Sirin, explained in detail the vision of being killed by a bullet so that it does not fall under suspicion caused by Satan. Being killed by a bullet in a dream. The dream of firing a bullet is an excellent indication of many good things. Being killed by a bullet is an injury, and an injury in a dream indicates the dreamer’s ability. To reach his goal forcefully, and this goal may be to buy something. New, having children, marriage, success in study, or a high position at work. Being killed by bullets in a dream is a good dream that expresses blessings. To see yourself killed with a gun in a dream means money that the dreamer will get in the near future. Killed in a dream by Ibn Sirin’s bullets. Ibn Sirin says about shooting a corpse in a dream that it portends good, and murder in general is the possession of a large sum of money or having children after being deprived of it. From it for many years due to the dreamer’s infertility or infertility. wife. The dreamer has been doing this for a long time, and he is praying to God to make this happen in the near future. The great scholar Ibn Sirin also says that every murder in a dream is an injury desired by the fortuneteller, and he says that the murdered person has the greatest share in the dream, and when he sees the same girl She is killed in a dream, and this is evidence of her great success and superiority, and if the father sees that he is shooting his children in a dream, then this vision indicates his good upbringing of them and their reaching high positions of which the father is proud. Seeing the failed assassination attempts that Ibn Sirin interpreted as corruption of religion and morals And whoever sees in himself that attempts on his life were made to kill him and he was not killed, then this vision indicates bad news that will befall him and cause him great sadness, and when the student sees that he killed himself and did not die in his dream, he will fail in his studies as a result of his neglect to continue his studies and see the married woman herself, and that there are those who He tries to kill her, so he injured her and she did this. The vision indicates that her honor was damaged, her divorce, and the emergence of many scandals harmful to her and her reputation. Killing in a dream by shooting a single woman. When an unmarried woman sees that she is killing someone in a dream with a gun, this dream indicates her engagement to that person, and if she hits him with her gun in a dream, this indicates On the high status of this groom and her wedding party. . Seeing a married woman killing her husband in a dream With one of the weapons, it means pregnancy close to her husband, but if she sees herself killing her husband in a dream and fails to accomplish this task, it means that this woman has many marital problems with her

title: Interpretation of dreams about someone who looks like my father in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams for someone who resembles my father in a dream. If you are looking for what it carries, interpretation of dreams for someone who resembles my father in a dream and whether it is good or not according to the interpretations of scholars..Interpretation of dreams for someone who resembles my father in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for someone who resembles my father in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing someone who looks like you in a dream may indicate marriage, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees a person squeezing a happy person, this indicates sustenance, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees someone who looks sad to you, this may lead to trouble, and God knows best. Everything that is invisible. Interpretation of a dream about my father arguing with me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father arguing with me in a dream could be a sign of responsibility from the father, and God knows best. In the event that a married woman sees the father arguing with her, it may express the woman’s wrong actions, and God knows the unseen. When a girl sees She is single, her father is arguing, this can lead to wrong actions and she must return, and God is Most High and knows best. When you see an unmarried young man who has a father arguing with him in a dream, this may indicate wrong actions that he performs, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my father cheating on my mother in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father cheating on me To my mother in a dream can express negative changes, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees a father cheating on his mother, this may lead to some things that are not good and change for the worse, and God knows everything that no one has seen. If a married woman sees a father cheating on her mother, this may be a sign On a financial crisis, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. When a single young man sees his father cheating on his mother, this may be evidence that he is exposed to problems or bad changes, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my father who kidnapped me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my father who kidnapped me in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a kidnapping in a dream could be evidence of the presence of illegal or prohibited funds, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Likewise, if a married man sees a kidnapping, it may lead to trusting an unworthy person, and God knows the unseen. In If a young man sees kidnapping in a dream, it expresses defeat from preparation, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of dreams about my father proposing to me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my father proposing to me in a dream may express great knowledge and knowledge, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the father proposing to his son, he may resort to some of the sins he commits. He must return, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees a father engaged to his son in a dream, this may indicate that the son has committed sins and must separate from her, and God knows best everything that is not seen. Also, seeing a father engaged to his son may indicate inheritance, and God is All-Knowing. Interpretation The dream of my father who was released from prison in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of my father who was released from prison in a dream could be evidence of changes for the better, God willing. If a young man sees his father coming out of prison in a dream, this may indicate change and getting out of a boring life, and God knows the unseen. .if

title: I dreamed that I was pregnant in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansSeeing a dream that I am pregnant in a dream, every woman dreams of pregnancy and every girl dreams of becoming a mother as soon as possible, so she always has the idea of ​​pregnancy and imagines what she will look like during pregnancy and imagines what she will look like. Her child. For this reason, I tell you in this article many cases in which a pregnant woman dreams of pregnancy. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream: A woman’s dream of becoming pregnant while she has never been married before means that she will face problems or go through some physical problems in her life and they will disappear soon, God willing. The meaning of a dream about pregnancy for a married womanWhen a married woman dreams With pregnancy, on the contrary, this indicates that the woman will come soon, and Ibn Sirin said that a woman dreams of pregnancy when she thinks a lot about pregnancy, but if she does not think about pregnancy, but rather dreams. , it means that she will work in a new profession and her life will increase. A man dreams that he is pregnant. It is not strange for a man to dream that he is pregnant, but if a man dreams of pregnancy, this indicates a problem that the person hides from many people, but this problem has increased for that person, but the dream is good in general. And an increase in livelihood, money, and honor from a dream about pregnancy, whether male or female, married or single. A man’s dream of a pregnant woman. There are many interpretations if a man dreams of a pregnant woman, such as: that it appears that the man is worried and sad, a sign of love and adoration, a sign of a strange death, and the presence of that man to bury him. , And also. It indicates the death of a man in life's endeavors. When a man dreams that his wife is pregnant, this indicates goodness and abundance of livelihood. If a woman dreams of being pregnant and she is waiting to become a mother, God will answer her, God willing. A woman dreams that she is pregnant and giving birth. When a woman dreams that she is pregnant and giving birth, this means that she will get rid of some problems in her life, and when a woman dreams that her stomach is swollen like a pregnant woman, this means a change in her life. When A woman dreams of giving birth to a child during pregnancy, then she will give birth to a girl in reality, and whoever dreams of giving birth to a girl during pregnancy will give birth to a boy in reality. From his vision and wants to clarify... We take your comments at the end of the article via the Shamloul website.

title: Interpretation of seeing tears in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a pregnant woman

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing a dream of tears in a dream for a single, married and pregnant woman. A dream about tears is one of the dreams whose interpretation is not known to many people, but it causes terror and fear in the dreamer’s heart. There were many explanations that differed depending on whether the crying was accompanied by pain. Whether crying or silence, crying in a dream can indicate comfort and can indicate sadness, and here we will give you all possible interpretations of seeing tears in a dream. Interpretation of tears in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpreters differed regarding seeing tears in a dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he is screaming Loud and sharp, crying and moaning. It indicates many sorrows and pains that the dreamer feels and may indicate deep sadness for a loved one. Crying in a dream without screaming or moaning. It means getting rid of the worries and problems that you suffer from in your life and escaping from stress and anxiety. He interpreted it as indicating longevity, good health, and good things to come. Whoever sees in his dream that he is at a funeral and we cry over the dead without crying or groaning, it indicates the happiness and goodness that prevails among the owners of the house and the dreamer. They are wearing black clothes with screams and slaps. Lamentations indicate the many worries and worries that The dreamer suffers from it. Crying while reciting the Qur’an indicates that the dreamer has committed a sin and repented for it publicly, and wants to return to the path of righteousness, which indicates getting rid of worries and problems in his life. Whoever sees in his dream that the dead are a sad death, it indicates the comfort of the dead in this world and the hereafter. And proof of his good deeds. Whoever sees in a dream that the deceased is complaining about him, but without crying, this indicates the existence of a debt that his relative must pay. Interpretation of crying in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi agreed with Ibn Sirin in his interpretation of seeing crying in a dream. Crying was interpreted as screaming, moaning, and wearing black clothes, which indicates the many worries and problems that the dreamer is suffering from. I explained that crying while watching and reading the Holy Qur’an indicates repentance from sins, returning to God Almighty, longevity, and wellness. Different interpretations of seeing tears In a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is crying and then laughing, this indicates the imminent appearance of destruction and death. What did he see in his dream? Laugh and then cry indicates the elimination of worries, problems and sorrows. Whoever sees in his dream the presence of cold tears in the eyes indicates comfort and the elimination of worries. Tears fall from the right eye. It enters the left eye, and this indicates the marriage of one of the children, whether it is a girl or a boy. The flow of tears from the right eye is different from the left eye, so this indicates that there is an error. Who saw this in his dream? Tears rolled from her eyes without her crying. This is the attraction of a relative. For him. Whoever sees in a dream that tears cloud his eyes and do not fall, this indicates delicious food that he will receive from fatigue and trouble. Whoever sees in a dream that tears gather in his eyes and roll down his cheeks, this indicates helping others in their distress. Tears after yawning In the dream,
